appDescription: Track daily fasting times for your location
locationConfirmMessage: We detected you are in {district}, {city}, {country}. Is this correct?
locationConfirmCityMessage: We detected you are in {city}, {country}. Is this correct?
locationErrorMessage: Could not detect your location. Please select manually.
locationPermissionMessage: We need location permission to detect your location. Please select manually.
selectCitySub: Select your city and proceed to the next step.
selectDistrictSub: Finally, select the district you are in. If the district you are in does not appear. You can select same city.
diyanetWarning: All time information in the application is based on official data provided by the Presidency of Religious Affairs.
